author: Special Correspondent
V S
text:
RELIGION

Kannanur Mariamman Temple and Sri Kundathu Kaliamman Temple: Thirukalyanam and Kundam festival, Pappanaickenpalayam,8 a.m.

GENERAL

Millennium Alliance: FICCI Millennium Alliance workshop, PSG College of Arts and Science, 10 a.m.

SNS College of Technology: Training programme, 10 a.m.

Nehru Institute of Engineering & Technology: Conference, 9.30 a.m.

Dhanalakshmi Srinivasan College of Engineering: Conference, 9 a.m.

GRG School of Management Studies: Valediction of students, Shreyas Institute, 11 a.m.

Dr. Kalaingar Karunanidhi Institute of Technology: Faculty development programme, 9.30 a.m.

SBOA Matriculation and Higher Secondary School: KG diploma presentation, 9.30 a.m.

Lions Club of Coimbatore Ram Nagar: Annual visitation, Hotel Vijay Park Inn, Senguptha Street, Ram Nagar, 6 p.m.

Sri Ramakrishna Engineering College: Management Studies Department organises seminar, 9.30 a.m.; Department of Electronics and Communication Engineering organises seminar, 9.30 a.m.

H & C Stores: Children’s Book Festival, 100 feet road, near Ganga Yamuna Theatre, 10 a.m.

Sri Krishna College of Engineering and Technology: Conference on industrial automation and robotics, 9.30 a.m.

Coimbatore Institute of Technology: Department advisory committee meeting, 6 p.m.

Avinashilingam University: Valedictory meeting of the Nutrition Association and Nutrition Society of India, 11 a.m.

PSG College of Arts and Science: Department of English releases three books, GRD Auditorium, 9.30 a.m.

Hindusthan College of Engineering and Technology: First aid training programme, 9.30 a.m.
title: In Coimbatore Today
